title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The library include in the report design currently stores an absolute path. The property <fileName> points to 'E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'. The property <namespace> is set to 'lib1'.
EB: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path. When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located at '$project/test', the relative path should be saved as '$project/test/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'.
